snippet: At the junior trials at the beginning of this month, in the under-21 open division, Oren Kriegel, Christopher Huber, Benjamin Kristensen and Kevin Rosenberg won the first final to become USA-1 in the World Youth Teams Championships.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played in under-21 division of junior trials in Atlanta.
lead_paragraph: At the junior trials at the beginning of this month, in the under-21 open division, Oren Kriegel, Christopher Huber, Benjamin Kristensen and Kevin Rosenberg won the first final to become USA-1 in the World Youth Teams Championships.

headline.main: Finals for U.S. World Youth Teams
